sentences.cn: 这个月早些时候，所有员工的工资都被冻结了。

sentences.en: Freeze it only until firm but not rock solid.
sentences.cn: 把它冻硬，但是不要硬得像石头一样。

sentences.en: He slipped and broke his leg during the big freeze.
sentences.cn: 他在严寒期间滑倒,摔断了腿.

sentences.en: Ice could freeze up their torpedo release mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 冰可能会冻死他们的鱼雷发射装置。

sentences.en: Most fresh herbs will freeze successfully.
sentences.cn: 大多数新鲜的芳草都很适宜冷冻贮藏。

sentences.en: Pure water sometimes does not freeze until it reaches minus 40 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 纯净水有时候要降到零下40摄氏度才会结冰。

sentences.en: Relations with somebody were still in deep freeze.
sentences.cn: 同某人的关系仍然极度冷淡.

sentences.en: The coffee is freeze-dried to seal in all the flavour.
sentences.cn: 咖啡经冷冻干燥以保留原汁原味。

sentences.en: The others tried to freeze me out of the conversation.
sentences.cn: 其他人试图将我排挤在谈话之外

sentences.en: The trees were damaged by a freeze in December.
sentences.cn: 那些树因为12月里的一次冰冻而遭到毁坏。

sentences.en: The weatherman predicted a freeze for tonight.
sentences.cn: 天气预报员预报今晚有冰冻.

sentences.en: They seemed to freeze me out of the family.
sentences.cn: 看样子他们想把我从这个家里赶走.

sentences.en: we'll freeze on to those facts.
sentences.cn: 我们将紧紧抓住那些事实。

sentences.en: When the chicken is cooked I'll freeze some.
sentences.cn: 鸡肉做好以后,我会把一部分冷冻起来.

sentences.en: You can freeze the soup at this stage.
sentences.cn: 这时可以把汤冷冻起来。

sentences.en: Your hands will freeze doing this.
